sect2.title: Use default variable of the Query types
sect2.para: Use the default variables of the query types as much as possible. The default variables are available as static final fields in the query types. The name is always the decapitalized version of the simple type name. For the type Account this would be account :
Querydsl query types are safe to re-use, and by using Querydsl default variables you save initialization time and memory.
